code: import axios from"axios";var PAGE_SIZE=25;var basePath="https://api.openalex.org";export var api={getWorks:function getWorks(queryString){var page=arguments.length>1&&arguments[1]!==undefined?arguments[1]:1;return axios("".concat(basePath,"/works?page=").concat(page,"&per-page=").concat(+PAGE_SIZE,"&filter=").concat(queryString)).then(function(res){return res.data;});},getAuthors:function getAuthors(queryString){var page=arguments.length>1&&arguments[1]!==undefined?arguments[1]:1;return axios("".concat(basePath,"/authors?page=").concat(page,"&per-page=").concat(+PAGE_SIZE,"&filter=").concat(queryString)).then(function(res){return res.data;});},getInstitutions:function getInstitutions(queryString){var page=arguments.length>1&&arguments[1]!==undefined?arguments[1]:1;return axios("".concat(basePath,"/institutions?page=").concat(page,"&per-page=").concat(+PAGE_SIZE,"&filter=").concat(queryString)).then(function(res){return res.data;});},getSources:function getSources(queryString){var page=arguments.length>1&&arguments[1]!==undefined?arguments[1]:1;return axios("".concat(basePath,"/sources?page=").concat(page,"&per-page=").concat(+PAGE_SIZE,"&filter=").concat(queryString)).then(function(res){return res.data;});},getConcepts:function getConcepts(queryString){var page=arguments.length>1&&arguments[1]!==undefined?arguments[1]:1;return axios("".concat(basePath,"/concepts?page=").concat(page,"&per-page=").concat(+PAGE_SIZE,"&filter=").concat(queryString)).then(function(res){return res.data;});}};
